programme.title: A Plea to the Senate
programme.short_synopsis: A European plea to the US Senate reminds Alistair Cooke of the 1919 Treaty of Versailles.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on the European pleas to the US Senate to ratify the Test Ban Treaty, and compares it with the Senate's condemnation of 1919 Treaty of Versailles.
